ISSUE.TITLE: Push docker image to multiple locations
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We are building a platform that uses Drone for CI and building Docker images. We would like to push some docker images to more than one repository on bintray. As it stands right now, we can only push to one location, limiting our functionality. It would be great to be able to specify more than one docker push destination

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [MISC] Add customized commit message support to PR (#1126)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [code-1642] added copy button for relative file path (#1125)
